examples.titleCn: Level of Detail 控件
examples.descriptionCn: Modify how Level of Detail behaves at high pitch angles.

examples.title: Locale switching
examples.description: Show how localization can be applied manually to UI elements. Hover over a control to see the translated tooltip.
examples.titleCn: Locale switching
examples.descriptionCn: 显示 how localization can be applied manually 到 UI elements. 悬停 over 控件 到 see translated tooltip.

examples.title: Locate the user
examples.description: Geolocate the user and then track their current location on the map using the GeolocateControl.
examples.titleCn: Locate user
examples.descriptionCn: Geolocate user and then track their current location on 地图 使用 GeolocateControl.

examples.title: Measure distances
examples.description: Click points on a map to create lines that measure distanced using turf.length.
examples.titleCn: 测量 distances
examples.descriptionCn: 点击 点 on 地图 到 创建 线 that 测量 distanced 使用 turf.length.

examples.title: Navigate the map with game-like controls
examples.description: Use the keyboard's arrow keys to move around the map with game-like controls.
examples.titleCn: Navigate 地图 使用 game-like 控件
examples.descriptionCn: 使用 keyboard's arrow keys 到 移动 around 地图 使用 game-like 控件.

examples.title: Offset the vanishing point using padding
examples.description: Offset the center or vanishing point of the map to reduce distortion when floating elements are displayed over the map.
examples.titleCn: Offset vanishing 点 使用 padding
examples.descriptionCn: Offset center or vanishing 点 of 地图 到 reduce distortion when floating elements are displayed over 地图.

examples.title: PMTiles source and protocol
examples.description: Uses the PMTiles plugin and protocol to present a map.
examples.titleCn: PMTiles 数据源 and protocol
examples.descriptionCn: Uses PMTiles plugin and protocol 到 present 地图.

examples.title: Render world copies
examples.description: Toggle between rendering a single world and multiple copies of the world using setRenderWorldCopies.
examples.titleCn: 渲染 world copies
examples.descriptionCn: Toggle between rendering single world and 多个 copies of world 使用 setRenderWorldCopies.

examples.title: Restrict map panning to an area
examples.description: Prevent a map from being panned to a different place by setting maxBounds.
examples.titleCn: Restrict 地图 panning 到 area
examples.descriptionCn: Prevent 地图 from being panned 到一个 different place by setting maxBounds.

examples.title: Set center point above ground
examples.description: Set the center point above ground level.
examples.titleCn: Set center 点 above ground
examples.descriptionCn: Set center 点 above ground level.

examples.title: Set pitch and bearing
examples.description: Initialize a map with pitch and bearing camera options.
examples.titleCn: Set pitch and bearing
examples.descriptionCn: Initialize 地图 使用 pitch and bearing 相机 options.

examples.title: Show polygon information on click
examples.description: When a user clicks a polygon, show a popup containing more information.
examples.titleCn: 显示 多边形 information on 点击
examples.descriptionCn: When user clicks 多边形, 显示 弹窗 containing more information.

examples.title: Sky, Fog, Terrain
examples.description: Allows changing the sky, fog and horizon color and blends.
examples.titleCn: 天空, 雾, 地形
examples.descriptionCn: Allows changing 天空, 雾 and horizon 颜色 and blends.

examples.title: Slowly fly to a location
examples.description: Use flyTo with flyOptions to slowly zoom to a location.
examples.titleCn: Slowly 飞行到 location
examples.descriptionCn: 使用 flyTo 使用 flyOptions 到 slowly 缩放 到一个 location.

examples.title: Style labels with local fonts
examples.description: Apply local fonts to your style’s text labels. This option is suitable if you don’t need every user to see exactly the same font, or if you want to avoid relying on a third-party content delivery network (CDN). For maximum compatibility, the text-font property should include fonts commonly found on multiple platforms.
examples.titleCn: 样式化 标签 使用 local fonts
examples.descriptionCn: Apply local fonts 到 your 样式化’s 文本 标签. This option is suitable if you don’t need every user 到 see exactly same 字体, or if you want 到 avoid relying on third-party content delivery network (CDN). For maximum compatibility, 文本-字体 property should include fonts commonly found on 多个 platforms.

examples.title: Style labels with Web fonts
examples.description: Apply Web fonts to your style’s text labels. Unlike signed distance field (SDF) glyph sets, Web fonts are available from a variety of providers, or your can make your own using popular tools. This option is suitable for fonts that are only available through a third-party content delivery network (CDN) for technical or legal reasons, as well as fonts that are incompatible with SDF, such as variable fonts. For compatibility with Android and iOS applications, specify equivalent fonts in the style’s font-faces property.
examples.titleCn: 样式化 标签 使用 Web fonts
examples.descriptionCn: Apply Web fonts 到 your 样式化’s 文本 标签. Unlike signed distance field (SDF) glyph sets, Web fonts are available from variety of providers, or your can make your own 使用 popular tools. This option is suitable for fonts that are only available through third-party content delivery network (CDN) for technical or legal reasons, as well as fonts that are incompatible 使用 SDF, such as variable fonts. For compatibility 使用 Android and iOS applications, specify equivalent fonts 在 样式化’s 字体-faces property.

examples.title: Style lines with a data-driven property
examples.description: Create a visualization with a data expression for line-color.
examples.titleCn: 样式化 线 使用 数据驱动 property
examples.descriptionCn: 创建 visualization 使用 数据 expression for 线-颜色.

examples.title: Sync movement of multiple maps
examples.description: Synchronize MapLibre GL JS maps with the sync-move plugin.
examples.titleCn: 同步 多个 地图
examples.descriptionCn: Synchronize MapLibre GL JS 地图 使用 sync-移动 plugin.

examples.title: Toggle deck.gl layer
examples.description: Toggle deck.gl layer using maplibre.
examples.titleCn: Toggle deck.gl 图层
examples.descriptionCn: Toggle deck.gl 图层 使用 maplibre.

examples.title: Toggle interactions
examples.description: Enable or disable UI handlers on a map.
examples.titleCn: Toggle interactions
examples.descriptionCn: 启用 or disable UI handlers on 地图.

examples.title: Update a feature in realtime
examples.description: Change an existing feature on your map in real-time by updating its data.
examples.titleCn: Update feature in realtime
examples.descriptionCn: 切换 existing feature on your 地图 in real-时间 by updating its 数据.

examples.title: Use a fallback image
examples.description: Use a coalesce expression to display another image when a requested image is not available.
examples.titleCn: 使用 fallback 图像
examples.descriptionCn: 使用 coalesce expression 到 显示 another 图像 when requested 图像 is not available.

examples.title: Use addProtocol to Transform Feature Properties
examples.description: Reverse country names with addProtocol in plain JavaScript.
examples.titleCn: 使用 addProtocol 到 Transform Feature Properties
examples.descriptionCn: Reverse country names 使用 addProtocol in plain JavaScript.

examples.title: Use locally generated ideographs
examples.description: Set localIdeographFontFamily to override the font used for displaying CJK (Chinese, Japanese and Korean) characters, ignoring the map style. This setting must be a CSS font rule specifying fallbacks of on-device fonts. Set localIdeographFontFamily to false to use server-provided fonts, which is much slower.
examples.titleCn: 使用 locally generated ideographs
examples.descriptionCn: Set localIdeographFontFamily 到 override 字体 used for displaying CJK (Chinese, Japanese and Korean) characters, ignoring 地图 样式化. This setting must be CSS 字体 rule specifying fallbacks of on-device fonts. Set localIdeographFontFamily 到 false 到 使用 server-provided fonts, which is much slower.

examples.title: Variable label placement with offset
examples.description: Use text-variable-anchor-offset to allow high priority labels to shift position to stay on the map.
examples.titleCn: Variable 标签 placement 使用 offset
examples.descriptionCn: 使用 文本-variable-anchor-offset 到 allow high priority 标签 到 shift position 到 stay on 地图.

examples.title: Variable label placement
examples.description: Use text-variable-anchor to allow high priority labels to shift position to stay on the map.
examples.titleCn: Variable 标签 placement
examples.descriptionCn: 使用 文本-variable-anchor 到 allow high priority 标签 到 shift position 到 stay on 地图.

examples.title: View a fullscreen map
examples.description: Toggle between current view and fullscreen mode. Does not work on iPhones because a pseudo-fullscreen is used, and the code is embedded in an iframe, which prevents the map from scaling.
examples.titleCn: View fullscreen 地图
examples.descriptionCn: Toggle between current view and fullscreen mode. Does not work on iPhones because pseudo-fullscreen is used, and code is embedded 在一个 iframe, which prevents 地图 from scaling.

examples.title: View local GeoJSON (experimental)
examples.description: View local GeoJSON with experimental File System Access API.
examples.titleCn: View local GeoJSON (experimental)
examples.descriptionCn: View local GeoJSON 使用 experimental File System Access API.

examples.title: View local GeoJSON
examples.description: View local GeoJSON without server upload.
examples.titleCn: View local GeoJSON
examples.descriptionCn: View local GeoJSON without server upload.

examples.title: Visualize population density
examples.description: Use a variable binding expression to calculate and display population density.
examples.titleCn: 可视化 population density
examples.descriptionCn: 使用 variable binding expression 到 calculate and 显示 population density.

examples.title: Zoom and planet size relation on globe
examples.description: Explanation of zoom and planet size relation under globe projection and how to account for it when changing the map center and zoom by some delta.
examples.titleCn: 缩放 and planet size relation on 地球
examples.descriptionCn: Explanation of 缩放 and planet size relation under 地球 projection and how 到 account for it when changing 地图 center and 缩放 by some delta.
